products.title: Velvet Petal Pink Roman Blind
products.description: Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft roman blind in petal pink, introduces a soft light pink hue to your home.

products.title: Crushed Velvet Rose Quartz Roman Blind
products.description: Soft and homely, this crushed velvet rose quartz roman blind gives you the comfort of thick, delicate fabric and the contemporary charm of a soft pink colourway. products.title: Paeonia Velvet Rose Roman Blind
products.description: How romantic. Weve taken the paeonia rose roman blind and dressed it with a sumptuous velvet fabric. Its just heavenly. From the texture to the pattern, we simply adore this design. The pattern is a complex one too, depicting a beautiful watercolour painting, with blooming how romantic.
